parameter.name: XI_PRM_DOWNSAMPLING
parameter.short_description: Change image resolution by binning or skipping.

parameter.name: XI_PRM_AVAILABLE_BANDWIDTH
parameter.short_description: Calculate and return available interface bandwidth(int Megabits)

parameter.name: XI_PRM_WIDTH
parameter.short_description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).

parameter.name: XI_PRM_HEIGHT
parameter.short_description: Height of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).

parameter.name: XI_PRM_OFFSET_X
parameter.short_description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

parameter.name: XI_PRM_OFFSET_Y
parameter.short_description: Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

parameter.name: XI_PRM_LUT_INDEX
parameter.short_description: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the LUT.

parameter.name: XI_PRM_LUT_VALUE
parameter.short_description: Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT

parameter.name: XI_PRM_TRG_SOFTWARE
parameter.short_description: Generates an internal trigger. XI_PRM_TRG_SOURCE must be set to TRG_SOFTWARE.

parameter.name: XI_PRM_ACQ_FRAME_BURST_COUNT
parameter.short_description: Sets number of frames acquired by burst. This burst is used only if trigger is set to FrameBurstStart

parameter.name: XI_PRM_IS_DEVICE_EXIST
parameter.short_description: Returns 1 if camera connected and works properly.

parameter.name: XI_PRM_ACQ_TRANSPORT_BUFFER_SIZE
parameter.short_description: Acquisition transport buffer size in bytes

parameter.name: XI_PRM_APPLY_CMS
parameter.short_description: Apply CMS profiles(input.icc and output.icm), perceptual inetent.

parameter.name: XI_PRM_COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY
parameter.short_description: Returns color filter array type of RAW data.

parameter.name: XI_PRM_MANUAL_WB
parameter.short_description: Calculates White Balance(xiGetImage function must be called)

parameter.name: XI_PRM_AE_MAX_LIMIT
parameter.short_description: Maximum limit of exposure in AEAG procedure

parameter.name: XI_PRM_AG_MAX_LIMIT
parameter.short_description: Maximum limit of gain in AEAG procedure

parameter.name: XI_PRM_AEAG_LEVEL
parameter.short_description: Average intensity of output signal AEAG should achieve(in %)

parameter.name: XI_PRM_DEBOUNCE_POL
parameter.short_description: Debounce polarity (pol = 1 t0 - falling edge, t1 - rising edge)

parameter.name: XI_PRM_IS_COOLED
parameter.short_description: Returns 1 for cameras that support cooling.

parameter.name: XI_PRM_TARGET_TEMP
parameter.short_description: Set sensor target temperature for cooling.

parameter.name: XI_PRM_SENSOR_MODE
parameter.short_description: Current sensor mode. Allows to select sensor mode by one integer. Setting of this parameter affects: image dimensions and downsampling.

parameter.name: XI_PRM_HDR_T1
parameter.short_description: Exposure time of first slope(in % of XI_PRM_EXPOSURE)

parameter.name: XI_PRM_HDR_T2
parameter.short_description: Exposure time of second slope(in % of XI_PRM_EXPOSURE)

parameter.name: XI_PRM_HDR_CURVE_GAMMA
parameter.short_description: Coefficient of HDR curve y = x pow hdr_curve_gamma, sets fixed exorure times XI_PRM_HDR_T1 and XI_PRM_HDR_T2, approximates XI_PRM_KNEEPOINT1 and XI_PRM_KNEEPOINT2

parameter.name: XI_PRM_DRV_VERSION
parameter.short_description: Returns version of current device driver.

modifier.description: Possible increment of parameter. Values min+X*increment are allowed to set.
Direct update (on the fly) application of parameter without stopping the stream (e.g. Exposure, Gain).

return_value.name: MM40_OLD_DRIVER_VERSION
return_value.description: Old version of device driver installed to the system.

return_value.name: MM40_GET_LAST_ERROR
return_value.description: To get error code please call GetLastError function.

return_value.name: MM40_ACQUISITION_STOPED
return_value.description: Acquisition has been stopped. It should be started before GetImage.

return_value.name: MM40_ACQUISITION_STOPED_WERR
return_value.description: Acquisition has been stoped with error.

return_value.name: MM40_INVALID_INPUT_ICC_PROFILE
return_value.description: Input ICC profile missed or corrupted

return_value.name: MM40_INVALID_OUTPUT_ICC_PROFILE
return_value.description: Output ICC profile missed or corrupted

return_value.name: MM40_NOT_ENOUGH_PRIVILEGES
return_value.description: Application doesn't enough privileges(one or more app

return_value.name: MM40_NOT_COMPATIBLE_DRIVER
return_value.description: Installed driver not compatible with current software

return_value.name: MM40_TM_INVALID_RESOURCE
return_value.description: TM file was not loaded successfully from resources

return_value.name: MM40_DEVICE_HAS_BEEN_RESETED
return_value.description: Device has been reseted, abnormal initial state

return_value.name: MM40_RESOURCE_OR_FUNCTION_LOCKED
return_value.description: Resource(device) or function locked by mutex

return_value.name: XI_BANDWIDTH_NOT_SUPPORTED
return_value.description: This camera does not support currently available bandwidth

item.name: XI_DL_DETAIL
item.description: Same as trace plus locking resources

enumerator.name: XI_IMG_FORMAT
enumerator.description: structure containing information about output image format

item.name: XI_RAW8
item.description: 8 bits per pixel raw data from sensor

item.name: XI_RAW16
item.description: 16 bits per pixel raw data from sensor

enumerator.name: XI_COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY
enumerator.description: structure containing information about bayer color matrix

enumerator.name: XI_BP
enumerator.description: structure containing information about buffer policy(can be safe, data will be copied to user/app buffer or unsafe, user will get internally allocated buffer without data copy).

item.name: XI_BP_UNSAFE
item.description: User gets pointer to internally allocated circle buffer and data may be overwritten by device.

item.name: XI_BP_SAFE
item.description: Data from device will be copied to user allocated buffer or xiApi allocated memory.

enumerator.name: XI_TRG_SOURCE
enumerator.description: structure containing information about trigger source

item.name: XI_TRG_OFF
item.description: Camera works in free run mode.

enumerator.name: XI_TRG_SELECTOR
enumerator.description: structure containing information about trigger functionality

item.name: XI_TRG_SEL_FRAME_START
item.description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame

item.name: XI_TRG_SEL_EXPOSURE_ACTIVE
item.description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of one frame.

item.name: XI_TRG_SEL_FRAME_BURST_START
item.description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.

item.name: XI_TRG_SEL_FRAME_BURST_ACTIVE
item.description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.

enumerator.name: XI_ACQ_TIMING_MODE
enumerator.description: structure containing information about acqisition timing modes

item.name: XI_ACQ_TIMING_MODE_FREE_RUN
item.description: Selects a mode when sensor timing is given by fastest framerate possible (by exposure time and readout).

item.name: XI_ACQ_TIMING_MODE_FRAME_RATE
item.description: Selects a mode when sensor frame acquisition start is given by frame rate.

enumerator.name: XI_GPI_MODE
enumerator.description: structure containing information about GPI functionality

item.name: XI_GPI_OFF
item.description: Input off. In this mode the input level can be get using parameter XI_PRM_GPI_LEVEL.

item.name: XI_GPI_EXT_EVENT
item.description: External signal input. It is not implemented yet.

enumerator.name: XI_GPO_MODE
enumerator.description: structure containing information about GPO functionality

item.name: XI_GPO_FRAME_TRIGGER_READY
item.description: On when sensor is ready for next trigger edge.

item.name: XI_GPO_FRAME_TRIGGER_READY_NEG
item.description: Off when sensor is ready for next trigger edge.

item.name: XI_GPO_EXPOSURE_PULSE
item.description: Short On/Off pulse on start of each exposure.

item.name: XI_GPO_EXPOSURE_PULSE_NEG
item.description: Short Off/On pulse on start of each exposure.

enumerator.name: XI_LED_MODE
enumerator.description: structure containing information about LED functionality

item.name: XI_LED_HEARTBEAT
item.description: set led to blink if link is ok, (led 1), heartbeat (led 2)

item.name: XI_LED_TRIGGER_ACTIVE
item.description: set led to blink if trigger detected

item.name: XI_LED_EXT_EVENT_ACTIVE
item.description: set led to blink if external signal detected

item.name: XI_LED_ACQUISITION
item.description: set led to blink if data streaming

item.name: XI_LED_EXPOSURE_ACTIVE
item.description: set led to blink if sensor integration time

item.name: XI_LED_FRAME_ACTIVE
item.description: set led to blink if device busy/not busy

item.name: XI_LED_LINK
item.description: set led to blink if link is ok

enumerator.name: XI_PRM_TYPE
enumerator.description: structure containing information about parameters type

enumerator.name: XI_CMS_MODE
enumerator.description: structure containing information about CMS functionality

structure.name: XI_IMG, *LPXI_IMG
structure.description: structure containing information about incoming image.

member.name: size
member.description: Size of current structure on application side. When xiGetImage is called and size>=SIZE_XI_IMG_V2 then GPI_level, tsSec and tsUSec are filled.

member.name: bp
member.description: pointer to data. If NULL, xiApi allocates new buffer.

member.name: bp_size
member.description: Filled buffer size. When buffer policy is set to XI_BP_SAFE, xiGetImage will fill this field with current size of image data received.

member.name: nframe
member.description: frame number(reset by exposure, gain, downsampling change).

member.name: black_level
member.description: Black level of image (ONLY for MONO and RAW formats)

define.name: SIZE_XI_IMG_V2
define.description: structure size with timestamp and GPI level information

define.name: SIZE_XI_IMG_V3
define.description: structure size with black level information

define.name: XI_PRMM_DIRECT_UPDATE
define.description: Parameter modifier for direct update without stopping the streaming. E.g. XI_PRM_EXPOSURE XI_PRMM_DIRECT_UPDATE can be used with this modifier
